comments:
After upgrading from a previous build to 3.1M3 and rebuilding a project
(consisting of 95 java files) that uses JDK 5.0 features (generics and varargs)
I get an "Internal compiler Error" in one class of the project (which doesn't
contain any 5.0 specific features itself). Removing this class causes the same
error to appear in an arbitrary (?) other class. The same error comes up
sometimes when opening source files showing the message "An internal error
occurred during: Java AST creation".

Another project that also uses 5.0 features can be opened and compiled without
problems.

The error log contains an entry "Errors during build" that contains the
following stack trace:

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1
	at
